DOC.brief_title: The Effect Transcutaneous Electric Nerve Stimulation Primary Dysmenorrhea-a Randomized Control Study
DOC.detailed_description: Over 50 % American woman suffer dysmenorrhea 10 % take sick leave 1-2 day . Previous randomize control study demonstrate pain relief effect use high frequency TENS dysmenorrheal pain . However , investigation conduct investigate effect high frequency TENS female population country . The purpose study investigate effect high frequency TENS compare placebo effect sham TENS randomize control study .
